skillTree.name: Horned One
skillTree.description: Very rare and virtually extinct, even in Lustria, the Horned One's preternatural swiftness puts it way ahead of other Cold Ones.

skillTree.name: Ripperdactyl
skillTree.description: Unique and terrifying flying reptiles that are just as much a danger to their riders as the enemy!

skillTree.name: Ancient Stegadon (Engine of the Gods)
skillTree.description: Only the eldest, largest and most ferocious of their kind can move the Engines of the Gods!

effects.description: Mount: Ancient Stegadon (Engine of the Gods)

skillTree.name: Agility of the Lizard
skillTree.description: Lizardmen can move with deceptive speed and agility when they have to.

skillTree.name: Protection of the Old Ones
skillTree.description: Across the gulf of space, the serene Potec has shared the secrets of time so that the Lizardmen may protect themselves against supernatural attack.

skillTree.name: Prophecy of Sotek
skillTree.description: Idolised by his fellow Skinks in a manner previously reserved for Slann Mage-Priests, Tehenhauin prophesied the Serpent Godâ€™s coming.

effects.description: Upkeep: -5% for Skink and Chameleon Skinks units
Upkeep: -10% for Skink and Chameleon Skinks units
Upkeep: -20% for Skink and Chameleon Skinks units

skillTree.name: Fanatic
skillTree.description: More than just a fantastic orator, Tehenhauin leads his armies personally across Lustria in a crusade against the vermin parasites.

skillTree.name: Prophecy of Eradication
skillTree.description: First comes the vermin, then comes the plagues, but it will end with the eradication of the Skaven - for they play no part in the Old Ones' plans.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Skaven, Warriors of Chaos, Norsca and Beastmen

skillTree.name: Disciples of Sotek
skillTree.description: Those who followed Tehenhauin knew the what would befall Lustria if they faltered. The prophecy must be seen through to the bitter end.

effects.description: Armour: +20 for Skink, Chameleon Skink, Red Crested Skink and Bastiladon (Ark of Sotek) units
Melee defence: +8 for Skink, Chameleon Skink and Red Crested Skink units

skillTree.name: Tide of Sotek
skillTree.description: Sotek's children swarm to Tehenhauin's call, vicious serpents that turn the tide of battle in the Prophet's favour.

effects.description: Leadership: +10 for Skink, Chameleon Skink, Red Crested Skink and Bastiladon (Ark of Sotek) units
Melee attack: +8 for Skink, Chameleon Skink and Red Crested Skink units

skillTree.name: Promises of Reconstruction
skillTree.description: Sotek's prophecy spoke of ruin and destruction but also of hope; with the vermin menace eradicated, the Lizardmen would rebuild anew.

skillTree.name: Sotek's Gifted
skillTree.description: To fulfil the prophecy and overcome the Skaven assault on Lustria, Sotek gifted great power to his followers.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -10% for Lore of Beasts

skillTree.name: Reverence
skillTree.description: Idolised by his followers, Tehenhauin attracts the loyalty of some of the finest Skink spawnings in all of Lustria.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +10% for Skink, Chameleon Skink, Red Crested Skink and Bastiladon (Ark of Sotek) units
Upkeep: -20% for Skink, Chameleon Skink, Red Crested Skink and Bastiladon (Ark of Sotek) units

skillTree.name: Enlighten
skillTree.description: Word of the Serpent-God has opened many Skinksâ€™ eyes to Tehenhauinâ€™s holy cause.

skillTree.name: Predatory Fighter
skillTree.description: Of course, those who live to kill must also kill to live...

skillTree.name: Enforcer of Order
skillTree.description: The Plan *will* be observed, even if every member of the younger races has to die to achieve the Old Ones' goals.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Skaven
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Warriors of Chaos, Norsca and Beastmen

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Expeditious Endeavour
skillTree.description: What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Wyssan's Wildform
skillTree.description: The spellcaster unleashes the beast within, using its fury to transform allies into bestial forms.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wyssan's Wildform"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wyssan's Wildform Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Wyssan's Wildform Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Wild Heart
skillTree.description: The spellcaster attunes the magic of the wild, channelling its ancient and arcane power.

ui_effects.description: âž• Increase to power reserves by 10
âž• Improves power recharge rate by 1 every 13 seconds

skillTree.name: Flock of Doom
skillTree.description: With a mighty bellow, the caster invokes Corvus the Crow Lord, summoning his servants to peck at the foe's eyes.

ui_effects.description: âž• 25% chance to deal 10 direct damage to 20 entities per second
âž– High chance opponent will resist damage
âž– Weak vs a single combatant
âž• 25% chance to deal 10 direct damage to 20 entities per second
âž– High chance opponent will resist damage
âž– Weak vs a single combatant
âž• 25% chance to deal 10 direct damage to 20 entities per second
âž– High chance opponent will resist damage
âž– Weak vs a single combatant
âž• 25% chance to deal 10 direct damage to 20 entities per second
âž– High chance opponent will resist damage
âž– Weak vs a single combatant
âž• 25% chance to deal 10 direct damage to 20 entities per second
âž– High chance opponent will resist damage
âž– Weak vs a single combatant

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Flock of Doom"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Flock of Doom Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Flock of Doom Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Pann's Impenetrable Pelt
skillTree.description: Calling upon the beast spirits of the wild, the caster sheathes vulnerable flesh in unyielding fur and hide.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt Upgraded"

skillTree.name: The Amber Spear
skillTree.description: Sounding a gnarled horn, the caster summons a glowing amber spear and hurls it at the foe with uncanny accuracy.

ui_effects.description: âž• Fires 1 projectile dealing 0 1250 and 0 175 explosion damage (2m)
âž• Fires 1 projectile dealing 0 1250 and 0 175 explosion damage (2m)
âž• Fires 1 projectile dealing 0 1250 and 0 175 explosion damage (2m)
âž• Fires 1 projectile dealing 0 1250 and 0 175 explosion damage (2m)
âž• Fires 1 projectile dealing 0 1250 and 0 175 explosion damage (2m)

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Amber Spear"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Amber Spear Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "The Amber Spear Upgraded"

skillTree.name: The Curse of Anraheir
skillTree.description: Nebulous nature spirits assail the foe, clawing at them with hands not nearly as insubstantial as they appear.

effects.description: Overcast spell: "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Curse of Anraheir"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Transformation of Kadon
skillTree.description: Kadon, a master of forms, was able to shift his shape into anything he chose. This mastery is used to summon a Manticore, as if Kadon himself fights for you.

ui_effects.description: âž• Powerful unit ideal for combat
âž– Summoned units degrade over time
âž– Spawned unit fights in this battle only

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -6 for "Transformation of Kadon"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for all spells

ui_effects.description: âž• Increase to power reserves by 15
âž• Improves power recharge rate by 1 every 7 seconds
âž• 25% chance to deal 10 direct damage to 20 entities per second
âž– High chance opponent will resist damage
âž– Weak vs a single combatant

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

skillTree.name: Proud Warrior
skillTree.description: A long-serving member of an ancient, honourable tradition.

skillTree.name: Skirmisher
skillTree.description: This seasoned warrior understands irregular combat perfectly: when to attack, when to hold back, when to withdraw behind heavier lines.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +3% for Skink, Chameleon Skink, Chameleon Stalker and Red Crested Skink units
Missile strength: +3% for Salamander and Razordon Hunting Pack units
Missile strength: +3% for Skink, Chameleon Skink and Chameleon Stalker units

Weapon strength: +5% for Skink, Chameleon Skink, Chameleon Stalker and Red Crested Skink units
Missile strength: +5% for Salamander and Razordon Hunting Pack units
Missile strength: +5% for Skink, Chameleon Skink and Chameleon Stalker units
Weapon strength: +5% for Salamander and Razordon Hunting Pack units
Melee defence: +4 for Salamander and Razordon Hunting Pack units
Melee defence: +4 for Skink, Chameleon Skink, Chameleon Stalker and Red Crested Skink units
Weapon strength: +10% for Skink, Chameleon Skink, Chameleon Stalker and Red Crested Skink units

Missile strength: +10% for Skink, Chameleon Skink and Chameleon Stalker units

Melee defence: +6 for Salamander and Razordon Hunting Pack units
Melee defence: +6 for Skink, Chameleon Skink, Chameleon Stalker and Red Crested Skink units

skillTree.name: Swift Rider
skillTree.description: Only the finest beast riders can hang on whilst their mounts crash through the jungle undergrowth or smash through the foe's ranks.

effects.description: Speed: +5% for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, Coatl and Cold One units
Weapon strength: +5% for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, Coatl and Cold One units
Speed: +10% for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, Coatl and Cold One units
Missile strength: +5% for Terradon Riders units
Weapon strength: +10% for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, Coatl and Cold One units
Speed: +15% for Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, Coatl and Cold One units
Missile strength: +10% for Terradon Riders units

skillTree.name: Sacred Guardian
skillTree.description: It is a great honour to direct the elite warriors who protect the Plan from calamity.

effects.description: Melee attack: +2 for Kroxigor, Sacred Kroxigor and Temple Guard units
Melee attack: +4 for Kroxigor, Sacred Kroxigor and Temple Guard units
Melee defence: +4 for Kroxigor, Sacred Kroxigor and Temple Guard units
Melee attack: +6 for Kroxigor, Sacred Kroxigor and Temple Guard units
Melee defence: +6 for Kroxigor, Sacred Kroxigor and Temple Guard units

skillTree.name: Hunt Leader
skillTree.description: The most intelligent hunter tends to move swiftly up the chain of command.

effects.description: Melee attack: +2 for Feral Carnosaur and Dread Saurian units
Weapon strength: +5% for Feral Carnosaur and Dread Saurian units
Melee attack: +4 for Feral Carnosaur and Dread Saurian units
Weapon strength: +10% for Feral Carnosaur and Dread Saurian units
Melee attack: +6 for Feral Carnosaur and Dread Saurian units

skillTree.name: Beast Driver
skillTree.description: The largest, most aggressive creatures - usually the oldest bulls of the herd - must be directed, lest their independent spirit lead them astray.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +3% for Stegadon, Feral Troglodon, Ancient Salamander and Bastiladon units
Missile strength: +3% for Stegadon, Feral Troglodon, Ancient Salamander and Bastiladon units
Weapon strength: +5% for Stegadon, Feral Troglodon, Ancient Salamander and Bastiladon units
Melee defence: +4 for Stegadon, Feral Troglodon, Ancient Salamander and Bastiladon units
Missile strength: +5% for Stegadon, Feral Troglodon, Ancient Salamander and Bastiladon units
Weapon strength: +10% for Stegadon, Feral Troglodon, Ancient Salamander and Bastiladon units
Melee defence: +6 for Stegadon, Feral Troglodon, Ancient Salamander and Bastiladon units
Missile strength: +10% for Stegadon, Feral Troglodon, Ancient Salamander and Bastiladon units

skillTree.name: Jungle Dominion
skillTree.description: The unforgiving law of the jungle is most clear on matters of ascendancy.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% for Saurus and Temple Guards units (Rank 7 and above)
Armour: +10 for Saurus and Temple Guards units (Rank 7 and above)
Magic resistance: 15% for Saurus and Temple Guards units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Spawn-Kin
skillTree.description: Braves who emerge from the same spawning often share a deep connection â€“ a bond which provides considerable advantages in battle.

effects.description: Missile resistance: 15% for Skinks, Chameleon Skinks, Red Crested Skinks, Salamander and Razordon Hunting Packs, Kroxigor and Sacred Kroxigor units  (Rank 7 and above)
Melee defence: +5 for Skinks, Chameleon Skinks, Red Crested Skinks, Salamander and Razordon Hunting Packs, Kroxigor and Sacred Kroxigor units  (Rank 7 and above)
Leadership: +5 for Skinks, Chameleon Skinks, Red Crested Skinks, Salamander and Razordon Hunting Packs, Kroxigor and Sacred Kroxigor units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Soul Bound
skillTree.description: Mount and rider, together as one at their very cores. Indivisible.

effects.description: Melee attack: +5 for Cold One, Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, and Coatl units (Rank 7 and above)
Melee defence: +5 for Cold One, Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, and Coatl units (Rank 7 and above)
Missile resistance: 15% for Cold One, Terradon Riders, Ripperdactyl Riders, and Coatl units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Epicentrist
skillTree.description: You need to be at the very centre of this pack of furious monsters to have the minutest chance of controlling their rage. Good luck!

effects.description: Armour: +10 for Ancient Salamander, Bastiladon, Stegadon, Feral Carnosaur, Feral Troglodon and Dread Saurian units (Rank 7 and above)
Charge bonus: +15 for Ancient Salamander, Bastiladon, Stegadon, Feral Carnosaur, Feral Troglodon and Dread Saurian units (Rank 7 and above)
Leadership: +5 for Ancient Salamander, Bastiladon, Stegadon, Feral Carnosaur, Feral Troglodon and Dread Saurian units (Rank 7 and above)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Iron Disciplinarian
skillTree.description: This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.

skillTree.name: Fervent
skillTree.description: Through our acts, the gods will cleanse the lands.

skillTree.name: Bonded Service
skillTree.description: The Lords rule, the peasants toil. Nothing has changed in over a thousand years.

skillTree.name: Ancient Cunning
skillTree.description: Such long-lived creatures develop a level of guile that mortals cannot match.

skillTree.name: Draftmaster
skillTree.description: Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Geomantic Sustenance
skillTree.description: The power generated by the overarching Geomantic Web can also be used to nourish the Saurus on the march.

skillTree.name: Wary
skillTree.description: This warrior has been ambushed previously and got themselves and many of their compatriots away safely. Such things make one naturally suspicious.

skillTree.name: Gifts of the Jungle
skillTree.description: Life in the jungle means knowing the difference between which flora can heal and what, if ingested, will kill you.

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

backgroundSkills.name: Chosen of the Serpent-God
backgroundSkills.description: At times of great import, a single Red Crested Skink emerges from the deep jungle, claiming the title of the once and future Prophet of Sotek.

items.name: Plaque of Sotek
items.description: Upon this stone plaque is inscribed an extract of the Prophecy of Sotek that grants additional warding to Tehenhauin.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Skaven
